Name: ClientEarth
Content:
HUGE WIN Today a court ruled that INEOS' giant new plastics project is illegal. This is a major moment in the fight against unnecessary plastics.

The ruling suspends the project. 

Read more https://clientearth.org/latest/press-office/press/major-blow-for-ineos-as-court-strikes-down-3bn-plastics-project…
